name: How Do I Say This... [Beta]
description:
Performance may depend on window size, for some reason-- if things are slow, zoom out in your browser.

-

For a long time, you've known you weren't like the other boys — and for or just as long, you haven't cared. But you're in 9th grade now, and the more you think about it, the less it all feels right. On a late night in early April, you figure it out — and there's only one person you can tell.

A story-driven bullet hell about coming out. Made as a final project for school!
